m_szDocTitle: Plug in your hybrid car | Science! | Geek.com
m_szDocSumamry: Plug in your hybrid car By  Apr. 7, 2005 11:57 am Subscribing to a newsletter indicates your consent to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy . More Geek Chinese satellite proves reproduction still works in space Hybrid cars have become very popular over the last few years, developing a cult following that rivals many computer game communities. The most popular hybrids are the Toyota Prius and the Honda Civic, which can get between 50 and 60 miles per gallon. Those two automobile companies and many others are working to increase this mileage, but it seems that third-parties with a different idea
